alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 11:08AM CDT until March 25 at 4:54AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Big Nance Creek at Courtland affecting Lawrence County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Nance Creek at Courtland. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water begins to cover roads south of downtown Courtland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 17.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.5 feet on 02/23/1971. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
